Package javelin.controller.event.urban.encounter

Class UrbanEncounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.event.EventCard
      • javelin.controller.event.urban.UrbanEvent
        • javelin.controller.event.urban.encounter.UrbanEncounter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Guards, Robbers
    public abstract class UrbanEncounter
extends UrbanEvent
    Abstract an encoutner with a group of Combatants. Offers a few standard options: bribe, fight, surrender and #rollskill(String, Squad, int). validate(Monster), #generateguards(int) and #fight(Squad, List) help set up an eventual Fight.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javelin.controller.event.EventCard

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public boolean validate​(Squad s,
                        int squadel)
        Description copied from class: EventCard
        Most cards don't require validation but for example, you may want to make sure the current Location is a Desert if this event only fits that particular climate. Note that certain events can be defined once and revisited later so mutable conditions such as time of day shouldn't be used for validation unless this is an instantaneous event. This is called before EventCard.define(Squad, int). Parameters are the same as EventDealer#generate(Squad, int, Location).
        Overrides:
        validate in class UrbanEvent
        Returns:
        true if this particular card can be used.

      • validate

        protected abstract boolean rollskill​(Squad s,
                                     int dc,
                                     java.lang.String message)
        Parameters:
        message - See intro.
        dc - TODO
        foes2 -
        Returns:
        true to de-escalate the encounter before it even begins. false if the skill roll failed or just to ignore this optional step.
